segments.text: I notice the boy standing on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so determined and focused, it's impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he knows how dangerous it is to be standing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should tell him to be careful, but I don't want to distract him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he's balancing is really amazing, but it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets the cookies and climbs down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water on the floor getting closer to him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm scared he might slip and fall, but he seems steady and sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's really brave to be standing so precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but admire his determination and focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he enjoys his cookies, but safely and without any accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
